*Food Allergy self-reportrequired ([not stated]#required)

profile: http://example.com/fhir/testable/Questionnaire/food-allergy-questionnaire "FoodAllergyQuestionnaire"

Variables

-NameDefaultValueDescriptionHint
*patientResourceIdexampleEnter a known resource id on the destination system.[resource.id]

test

name: PatientReadValidate

description: Test resource read on destination server and assert returned resource passes validation

action

Operations

-TypeResourceDescriptionAcceptContentTypeDestinationEncodeRequestUrlOriginParams
*Read (Details: http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/testscript-operation-codes code read = 'Read', stated as 'null')PatientResourceReadjsonjson1true1/${patientResourceId}

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionResponseCodeStopTestOnFailWarningOnly
*Confirm that the returned response code is 200 OK.response200falsefalse

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionResourceStopTestOnFailWarningOnly
*Confirm that the returned response payload is the specified resource.responsePatientfalsefalse

action

Asserts

-DescriptionDirectionStopTestOnFailValidateProfileIdWarningOnly
*Confirm that the returned resource conforms to the specified profile.responsefalsePatientProfilefalse

name: read-validate-patient-json
title: HL7 FHIR R4 TestScript Read Validate
description: Example TestScript to test resource read and profile validation

variable.name: patientResourceId
variable.description: Enter a known resource id on the destination system.

test.name: PatientReadValidate
test.description: Test resource read on destination server and assert returned resource passes validation

assert.description: Confirm that the returned response code is 200 OK.
Confirm that the returned response payload is the specified resource.
Confirm that the returned resource conforms to the specified profile.
